name: Vaadin.CheckboxElement

properties.name: autofocus
properties.description: Specify that this control should have input focus when the page loads.

properties.name: focused
properties.description: If true, the element currently has focus.

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: If true, the user cannot interact with this element.

properties.name: checked
properties.description: True if the checkbox is checked.

properties.name: indeterminate
properties.description:
Indeterminate state of the checkbox when it's neither checked nor unchecked, but undetermined.
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input/checkbox#Indeterminate_state_checkboxes

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of the control, which is submitted with the form data.

properties.name: value
properties.description: The value given to the data submitted with the checkbox's name to the server when the control is inside a form.

description:
`<vaadin-checkbox>` is a Polymer element for customized checkboxes.

```html
<vaadin-checkbox>
  Make my profile visible
</vaadin-checkbox>
```

### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are exposed for styling:

Part name         | Description
------------------|----------------
`wrapper`         | The `<label>` element which wrapps the checkbox and [part="label"]
`native-checkbox` | The `<input type="checkbox">` element
`checkbox`        | The `<span>` element for a custom graphical check
`label`           | The `<span>` element for slotted text/HTML label

The following attributes are exposed for styling:

Attribute    | Description
-------------|------------
`active`     | Set when the checkbox is pressed down, either with mouse, touch or the keyboard.
`disabled`   | Set when the checkbox is disabled.
`focus-ring` | Set when the checkbox is focused using the keyboard.
`focused`    | Set when the checkbox is focused.
